reviewText: Don't waste your money. Level design is terrible. Their idea of a fun level is giant chunks of the coarse awkwardly disappearing and re appearing while you power up your shot. Multiplayer is only local, because that is a ♥♥♥♥ing thing somehow in 2016. Camera angle is fixed and awkward and you have to click a ready up button for each hole. dumb

reviewText: Do not waste your money buying this game, local multiplayer is not the same as regular multiplayer. The graphics are terrible. im going to return this asap.

The game itself was lots of fun but it sucks that you can't play it online with steam friends :c
If you would change it to multiplayer it would be great and maybe you wouldn't get so much negative reviews.
I wont give it a negative review since it was a really good and enjoyable golf game :p
Multiplayer has my support.
